info.description:
# üöó API de Ve√≠culos ‚Äî Microsservi√ßos na AWS

> Projeto desenvolvido para a disciplina **T√≥picos Especiais em Redes ‚Äî 2025/2**  
> Universidade Federal do Esp√≠rito Santo ‚Äî Campus Alegre/ES  
> **Autores:** Artur Matos Siqueira e Erik Estevam

---

## üìã Sobre o Projeto

API REST para gerenciamento de ve√≠culos, constru√≠da com arquitetura de microsservi√ßos e implantada na AWS. O sistema √© composto por tr√™s servi√ßos independentes que se comunicam por meio de um Application Load Balancer, com pipeline de CI/CD automatizado via GitHub Actions e deploy Blue/Green sem downtime.

---

## üèóÔ∏è Arquitetura

```
                        ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
                        ‚îÇ   Application Load Balancer      ‚îÇ
                        ‚îÇ   (Path-based routing)           ‚îÇ
                        ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
                                 ‚îÇ          ‚îÇ         ‚îÇ
                    /api/auth    ‚îÇ /api/users‚îÇ  /api/vehicles
                                 ‚ñº          ‚ñº         ‚ñº
                          ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
                          ‚îÇ  Auth    ‚îÇ ‚îÇ  User   ‚îÇ ‚îÇ Vehicle  ‚îÇ
                          ‚îÇ Service  ‚îÇ ‚îÇ Service ‚îÇ ‚îÇ Service  ‚îÇ
                          ‚îÇ  :3001   ‚îÇ ‚îÇ  :3002  ‚îÇ ‚îÇ  :3003   ‚îÇ
                          ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¨‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
                               ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î¥‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
                                            ‚îÇ
                                    ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ñº‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
                                    ‚îÇ  AWS RDS      ‚îÇ
                                    ‚îÇ  MySQL        ‚îÇ
                                    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
```

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Tecnologias

| Componente       | Tecnologia                        |
|------------------|-----------------------------------|
| Backend          | Node.js + Express                 |
| Banco de Dados   | MySQL ‚Äî AWS RDS                   |
| Containers       | Docker + AWS ECS Fargate          |
| Load Balancer    | AWS Application Load Balancer     |
| Registry         | AWS ECR                           |
| CI/CD            | GitHub Actions                    |
| Deployment       | AWS CodeDeploy (Blue/Green)       |
| Monitoramento    | AWS CloudWatch                    |

---

## üöÄ Servi√ßos e Endpoints

### Auth Service ‚Äî `/api/auth`

| M√©todo | Rota                | Autentica√ß√£o | Descri√ß√£o              |
|--------|---------------------|--------------|------------------------|
| GET    | `/health`           | N√£o          | Health check           |
| POST   | `/api/auth/login`   | N√£o          | Login e gera√ß√£o de JWT |
| POST   | `/api/auth/verify`  | Bearer Token | Verifica token JWT     |

### User Service ‚Äî `/api/users`

| M√©todo | Rota              | Autentica√ß√£o | Descri√ß√£o               |
|--------|-------------------|--------------|-------------------------|
| GET    | `/health`         | N√£o          | Health check            |
| POST   | `/api/users`      | N√£o          | Criar usu√°rio           |
| GET    | `/api/users`      | N√£o          | Listar usu√°rios         |
| GET    | `/api/users/:id`  | N√£o          | Buscar usu√°rio por ID   |
| PUT    | `/api/users/:id`  | N√£o          | Atualizar usu√°rio       |
| DELETE | `/api/users/:id`  | N√£o          | Excluir usu√°rio         |

### Vehicle Service ‚Äî `/api/vehicles`

| M√©todo | Rota                  | Autentica√ß√£o | Descri√ß√£o              |
|--------|-----------------------|--------------|------------------------|
| GET    | `/health`             | N√£o          | Health check           |
| POST   | `/api/vehicles`       | Bearer Token | Criar ve√≠culo          |
| GET    | `/api/vehicles`       | Bearer Token | Listar ve√≠culos        |
| GET    | `/api/vehicles/:id`   | Bearer Token | Buscar ve√≠culo por ID  |
| PUT    | `/api/vehicles/:id`   | Bearer Token | Atualizar ve√≠culo      |
| DELETE | `/api/vehicles/:id`   | Bearer Token | Excluir ve√≠culo        |

---

## ‚ö° Como Usar

### 1. Login

```bash
curl -X POST http://veiculos-alb-1142325911.us-east-1.elb.amazonaws.com/api/auth/login \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email":"seu@email.com","password":"suasenha"}'
```

### 2. Usar o token nas requisi√ß√µes

```bash
curl -X GET http://veiculos-alb-1142325911.us-east-1.elb.amazonaws.com/api/vehicles \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer SEU_TOKEN_AQUI"
```

### 3. Criar um ve√≠culo

```bash
curl -X POST http://veiculos-alb-1142325911.us-east-1.elb.amazonaws.com/api/vehicles \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer SEU_TOKEN_AQUI" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "brand": "Toyota",
    "model": "Corolla",
    "year": 2024,
    "color": "Prata",
    "plate": "ABC1D23",
    "price": 95000,
    "status": "dispon√≠vel"
  }'
```

---

## üîÑ Pipeline CI/CD

O projeto utiliza GitHub Actions com tr√™s jobs encadeados:

```
push para main
      ‚îÇ
      ‚ñº
  ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê     ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê     ‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
  ‚îÇ  Test  ‚îÇ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ñ∂‚îÇ Build & Push ECR ‚îÇ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚ñ∂‚îÇ Deploy (Blue/Green) ‚îÇ
  ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò     ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò     ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
```

1. **Test** ‚Äî Executa linter e testes unit√°rios dos tr√™s servi√ßos em paralelo
2. **Build & Push** ‚Äî Builda as imagens Docker e envia para o AWS ECR com tag do commit
3. **Deploy** ‚Äî Atualiza as Task Definitions no ECS e executa deploy Blue/Green via CodeDeploy com traffic shifting gradual

---

## üóÑÔ∏è Banco de Dados

O banco MySQL est√° hospedado no AWS RDS com as seguintes tabelas principais:

- `users` ‚Äî Usu√°rios do sistema com roles `admin` e `user`
- `vehicles` ‚Äî Cadastro de ve√≠culos com status `dispon√≠vel`, `vendido` ou `manuten√ß√£o`

---

## üîí Seguran√ßa

- Senhas armazenadas com hash **bcrypt**
- Autentica√ß√£o via **JWT** com expira√ß√£o configur√°vel
- Secrets gerenciados pelo **AWS Secrets Manager**
- Security Groups restritivos ‚Äî RDS acess√≠vel apenas pelo ECS
- IAM roles com princ√≠pio de **least privilege**

---

## üìä Monitoramento

Logs centralizados no **AWS CloudWatch** com grupos por servi√ßo:

- `/ecs/auth-service`
- `/ecs/user-service`
- `/ecs/vehicle-service`

Alarmes configurados para CPU > 80%, Mem√≥ria > 80% e erros HTTP 5xx.

---

## üèÉ Executar Localmente

```bash
# Clonar o reposit√≥rio
git clone https://github.com/seu-usuario/veiculos-api.git
cd veiculos-api

# Subir todos os servi√ßos
docker-compose up -d

# Verificar se est√£o rodando
docker-compose ps

# Testar health checks
curl http://localhost:3001/health
curl http://localhost:3002/health
curl http://localhost:3003/health
```

---

## üìÅ Estrutura do Projeto

```
veiculos-api/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ services/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ auth-service/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ user-service/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ vehicle-service/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ infrastructure/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ appspec.yml
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ auth-service-task-definition.json
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ user-service-task-definition.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ vehicle-service-task-definition.json
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ database/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ schema.sql
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .github/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ workflows/
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ci-cd.yml
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ docker-compose.yml
```

---
